field.note:
This is the format that will be used to print each search term. You can use the following keywords:
  • %search_term% - a linked search term that performs a search when clicked
  • %number_of_occurrences% - the number of assets that include this search term (system wide)
When a search term is clicked, the search will be performed by this search page.

This is the field whose search terms will be listed. Only search fields consisting entirely of Asset Attribute, Metadata Field or Standard Asset Field data sources will be available. Search fields containing an Include All data source cannot be used.

A standard list displays all search terms on a single page or can be broken up into multiple pages.
An A-Z listing displays search terms grouped by their first letter.
A Random listing displays one or more search terms in random order.
This is the text that will be printed to link to the previous results page
This is the text that will be printed to link to the next results page

Set to '0' (zero) to list all search terms on the same page.
NOTE: This option is only valid when using the standard list format.
If the listing type is Random, this defines how many search terms are randomly displayed ('0' displays a single search term).
Keywords can be used to dynamically set the number of items on the page.
